alert.note: Alert for Lower Chehalis Valley Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 29 at 3:25AM PST until November 30 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 4 PM PST WEDNESDAY ABOVE 500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches, with locally higher amounts near the southern slopes of the Olympics. * WHERE...Far southwest Mason County and the interior lowlands of Grays Harbor County, above 500 feet. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 4 PM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light if any snow expected through the US 12 corridor and in the lower elevations of the zone.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Washington state, call 5 1 1.
